description:
There are very few books like it. Certainly, none written by someone in such an unusual position.

You see, Meditations was not meant to be a book for the reader, it was a book for the author. In Greek, it was titled Eis heauton or â€œTo Himself.â€ A more recent title also captures the essence: The Emperorâ€™s Handbook.
